name: Alaturka in Bowling Saloon
description:
Summary:

I had a dream a few days ago. I saw toilets in a bowling alley. Afterwards, I played a snowball fight and then I woke up. After that, I decided to make a game about this dream.

Controlls:
  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Mouse to look around
Licance and Copyright:

This is a free actually but I used assets for this. You can read, install and fork the Source Code of this.

Assets that use for this:

  • POLYGON City Pack for buildings
  • AmbientCG for textures
  • Billard model
  • Old Soviet fluorescent light that fluorescent light model
